name: ME! vs The Unrelenting Alien Invasion
name_original: ME! vs The Unrelenting Alien Invasion
description:
You are ME.  Yeah. That's your actual name.

You're an accountant who, in a hilarious™ turn of events, has been put in charge of saving the world from an unrelenting alien invasion (I mean, it's in the title).

Anyway... here's hoping you survive, buddy!

Made with love stress for Ludum Dare 47!

--------------------------------------------

Controls:

A and D change your orbital rotation.

Left Mouse Button fires rockets that kill aliens.

Right Mouse Button fires a lazer that collects REPAIR CRATES!

Your shield absorbs enemy bullets but does nothing to stop enemies.

THIS GAME HAS ONLY BEEN TESTED IN 1920x1080 and 800x600 - IT WILL LOOK AWFUL ON ALL OTHER RESOLUTIONS AND MAY IN FACT BE UNPLAYABLE.  YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED!

Sorry, no Mac or Linux builds. I ran out of time. :(
